Administration.definition: the act or process of administering [the of justice] 2 a

1.definition: the act or process of administering [the of justice]

2 a.definition: the management and disposal under court authority of the estate of a deceased person by an executor or an administrator

sub_terms.b: the management of an estate (as of a minor) by a trustee or guardian appointed to take charge of it
sub_terms.c: the management of assets held in a trust

3.definition: the execution of public affairs as distinguished from policy-making

4 a.definition: a body of persons (as of an organization) who administer

sub_terms.b: a group that makes up the executive branch of a presidential government

5.definition: the term of office of an administrative officer or body
